author: cframpton
msg: Adobe's flex.next work.  This contains bug fixes for existing features as well as new components and/or enhancements, some of which are complete and some of which are in an intermediary state yet to be determined.  As is, this does not build but I will work on that after the initial check in.

author: jens
msg: InMemory bug fixes: return score() 1.0 and not 100, Versioning: create by default major version, text search: restrict to mime type text/
